query:
update underway.task_attempt
            set state = $3,
                updated_at = now(),
                completed_at = now()
            where task_id = $1
              and task_queue_name = $2
              and attempt_number = $4
              and attempt_number = (
                  select max(attempt_number)
                  from underway.task_attempt
                  where task_id = $1
                    and task_queue_name = $2
              )
